noun.description: A solemn utterance intended to invoke a supernatural power to inflict harm or punishment on someone or something.
examples: she'd put a curse on him

noun.description: An offensive word or phrase used to express anger or annoyance.
examples: his mouth was spitting vile oaths and curses

verb.description: Invoke or use a curse against.
examples: it often seemed as if the family had been cursed

verb.description: Utter offensive words in anger or annoyance.
examples: drivers were cursing and sounding their horns
synonyms: take the lord's name in vain
